mapper.insert: insert into mooc_visual (id, source, target, sup, conf, group) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{source,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{target,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sup,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{conf,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{group,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update mooc_visual set source = #{source,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, target = #{target,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sup = #{sup,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, conf = #{conf,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, group = #{group,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, source, target, sup, conf, group from mooc_visual
